articles.title: Oil eases ahead of China, US data, but OPEC+ cuts support market - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Brent crude futures fell 22 cents, or 0.3%, to $78.25 a barrel by 0107 GMT, and U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude was at $73.57 a barrel, down 29 cents, or 0.4%.
